title: Before AI Puts Us Out of Work, AI Jobs Could Pay Well
description: AI jobs are paying on average 77% more than other jobs, with entry-level positions paying more than twice the average salary.

title: Three Possible Scenarios for Bitcoin ETFs in 2024
description: Will they or won’t they? The SEC is on the clock and crypto markets eagerly await its decision on a Bitcoin ETF. Here’s what could happen.

title: ECB issues vendor call, progress report on digital euro rulebook
description:
The eurozone monetary authority is in the preparatory stage for the launch of a central bank digital currency.

The European Central Bank (ECB) Rulebook Development Group has been designing a set of rules, standards and procedures for digital euro payments. The group has published a report on the draft of the rulebook, allowing the public a glimpse of the technical aspects of central bank digital currency design.

The development group includes representatives of industry advocacy groups and national central banks. It began its work in January 2023 and has addressed functional and operational models, high-level architecture and standards and participants’ rights and obligations under draft legislation.

The draft rulebook is currently under review by the development group as a whole. “Based on the feedback received as part of this process, the RDG will consider making adjustments to this first draft as required,” the ECB said in a statement.

Read more

title: Coinbase exec claims spot Bitcoin ETF is not overhyped
description:
Coinbase country head for Singapore Hassan Ahmed believes the approval of a spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETF) will be the catalyst for a “structural market change” for the flagship digital asset. Ahmed made the statement during an appearance on CNBC International on Jan. 2. He said: “[The ETFs] are as big a deal as people […]

title: Ethereum explorer Etherscan expands to Solana, acquires Solscan to serve ‘credibly neutral’ on-chain data
description: Etherscan claims that the broader goal of the acquisition is to "make on-chain data easy to access, driving mainstream blockchain adoption."

title: Matrixport Report Says SEC Unlikely to Approve Spot Bitcoin ETFs in January, Price to Drop Below $40,000
description: The crypto financial services platform Matrixport has said it does not see the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission approving any spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund in January. In its latest report, the crypto platform said it foresees the price of bitcoin dropping “back to the $36,000/$38,000 range.” Approvals Expected After January The crypto financial services platform […]

title: Google and University of Cambridge Partner for Responsible AI Impact
description: Google and the University of Cambridge have recently announced a multi-year research partnership aimed at advancing responsible artificial intelligence (AI) with a focus on addressing societal challenges, including climate change. The collaboration centers around key AI research initiatives and encompasses areas such as AI ethics, safety, human-centered robotics, human-machine interaction, healthcare, economic sustainability, and climate […]

title: Shiba Inu’s Shibarium implements new automated burning process
description: The Shiba Inu ecosystem is set to experience a significant transformation by implementing an automated Shibarium burn system starting January 2024. title: UBS Predicts AI Industry will Reach USD 420 Billion in Revenues by 2027
description: In a remarkable turn of events, the year 2023 witnessed the stellar performance of the “Magnificent Seven” US technology stocks, boasting gains ranging from 48% to an impressive 249%. title: Can Ethereum Compete With Celestia on Cost or Data Availability?
description:
In a recent episode of the Unchained podcast, notable figures in the blockchain space discussed the contrasting approaches of modular and monolithic blockchains. Chris Burniske, a partner at VC firm Placeholder, asked Solana founder Anatoly Yakovenko about Ethereum’s potential competition with Celestia, the first modular blockchain network designed to scale with user growth.  Burniske inquired, […]
